name: Joined (Jayden Kusuma)
description: Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021! Made in 2 days (not full, i got other stuff to do too). A survival game where one has a shield that can block any damage, and another has a laser visor to attack the enemies. Combine that together and boom you got a big fat ball that has both a shield and a visor (but moves slightly slower). This game was made in such a rush that there will be lots of bug like the spawn times (might crash the browser).
